p: Oral administration of OA inhibited DSS-induced colon shortening, macroscopic score, and MPO activity. The treatment with OA inhibited the differentiation of cells to Th17 in the colon’s lamina and decreased the expression of RORγt and IL-17 that expressed mainly in cells of the Th17 profile. The differentiation of Treg cells and the expression of Foxp3 and IL-10 were increased by treatment with OA [ 92].
